title: Case Management
description: Comprehensive case lifecycle management with SLA tracking and automation
overview: The Case Management module is the central hub for managing legal cases throughout their entire lifecycle. From initial scrutiny to final appeals, track cases through each stage with automated SLA monitoring, hearing management, and comprehensive documentation.

keyFeatures.title: Case Lifecycle Tracking
keyFeatures.description: Track cases through all legal stages from scrutiny to appeals
keyFeatures.gstRelevance: Follow GST litigation stages: Notice, Adjudication, Appeals, GSTAT, HC, SC

keyFeatures.title: SLA & Deadline Management
keyFeatures.description: Automated monitoring of legal deadlines and compliance
keyFeatures.gstRelevance: GST notices have strict reply deadlines - ensure compliance

keyFeatures.title: Hearing Calendar
keyFeatures.description: Integrated hearing scheduling and calendar management
keyFeatures.gstRelevance: Track GST appeal hearings and tribunal appearances

keyFeatures.title: Communication Hub
keyFeatures.gstRelevance: Manage correspondence with GST authorities and clients

keyFeatures.title: Document Management
keyFeatures.gstRelevance: Store notices, replies, evidence documents securely

keyFeatures.title: AI Assistant
keyFeatures.description: Intelligent case analysis and recommendation engine
keyFeatures.gstRelevance: Get AI insights on GST law compliance and strategy
